name: Littlewood (itch)
description:
In Littlewood, you play as a puppet who can control the power of gems.
Sent by the witch Beatrix, you must save the forest from the terrible
corrosion that is ravaging it.

Learn to master the secrets of the gems, avoid the traps of the forest
and restore it to its previous equilibrium.

CONTROLS

Left arrow and Right arrow to move
Down arrow to change form
Space to jump
